mapper.select: select emp.EMP_ID ,emp.PASSWORD ,emp.PHOTO_URL ,emp.EMP_NAME ,emp.JOIN_DATE ,emp.SSN ,emp.ZIP_CODE ,emp.ADDRESS ,emp.ADDRESS_DETAIL ,emp.PHONE ,emp.MOBILE ,emp.DEPT_CODE ,emp.POS_CODE ,emp.STATUS_CODE ,emp.LEAVE_DATE ,emp.BANK_CODE ,emp.ACCOUNT_NO ,emp.SALARY ,emp.REMARKS ,dep.DEPT_CODE ,dep.DEPT_NAME ,pos.POS_CODE ,pos.POS_NAME from TB_EMPLOYMENT_INFO emp inner join TB_DEPARTMENT_INFO dep join TB_POSITION_INFO pos on emp.DEPT_CODE = dep.DEPT_CODE and emp.POS_CODE = pos.POS_CODE order by emp.EMP_ID;

SELECT emp.EMP_ID ,emp.EMP_NAME ,emp.DEPT_CODE ,emp.POS_CODE ,dep.DEPT_NAME ,pos.POS_NAME FROM TB_EMPLOYMENT_INFO emp JOIN TB_DEPARTMENT_INFO dep ON emp.DEPT_CODE = dep.DEPT_CODE JOIN TB_POSITION_INFO pos ON emp.POS_CODE = pos.POS_CODE
emp.EMP_ID like concat('%', #{searchQuery}, '%')
emp.EMP_NAME like concat('%', #{searchQuery}, '%')
dep.DEPT_NAME like concat('%', #{searchQuery}, '%')
pos.POS_NAME like concat('%', #{searchQuery}, '%')
${searchType} like concat('%', #{searchQuery}, '%')

select emp.EMP_ID ,emp.PASSWORD ,emp.PHOTO_URL ,emp.EMP_NAME ,emp.JOIN_DATE ,emp.SSN ,emp.ZIP_CODE ,emp.ADDRESS ,emp.ADDRESS_DETAIL ,emp.PHONE ,emp.MOBILE ,emp.DEPT_CODE ,emp.POS_CODE ,emp.STATUS_CODE ,emp.LEAVE_DATE ,emp.BANK_CODE ,emp.ACCOUNT_NO ,emp.SALARY ,emp.REMARKS from TB_EMPLOYMENT_INFO emp where emp.EMP_ID = #{empId};
select dep.DEPT_CODE ,dep.DEPT_NAME ,dep.IS_USED from TB_DEPARTMENT_INFO dep where IS_USED = 'Y';
select pos.POS_CODE ,pos.POS_NAME ,pos.IS_USED from TB_POSITION_INFO pos where IS_USED = 'Y';
select stat.STAT_CODE ,stat.STAT_NAME ,stat.IS_USED from TB_EMPLOYMENT_STATUS_INFO stat where IS_USED = 'Y';
select bnk.BANK_CODE ,bnk.BANK_NAME ,bnk.IS_USED from TB_BANK_INFO bnk where IS_USED = 'Y';
select EMP_ID from TB_EMPLOYMENT_INFO order by EMP_ID desc limit 1;
select EMP_ID from TB_EMPLOYMENT_INFO where EMP_ID like concat(#{year}, '%') order by EMP_ID desc limit 1;
